name: SPELLFANG, the acid dragon mage (Wizard 25/ druid 5 / shifter 10)
author: Draconis

posts.author: Pan Draconis
posts.content:
Spellfang, the dragon mage (but also an alien queen)
 

This build should be credited at least 50% to Valerfor for many ideas and improvements.
Wizard dragons are rare, there is an old build of this kind by webshaman cdualepp & SBully if I’m not wrong, Puff the magic dragon.

They are rare because, since the version 1.69, you need too much druid levels to be a solid wizard so the only solution is to use the shifter class, then you loose the cheesy monk ac bonus with the huge synergy with the high wisdom and the owl’s insight druid spell. But in this case, this is not an issue : your ac as a dragon isn’t important, because as an undispellable wizard with 920 buffed HP, 50/+20 DR, and level 25 extended damage shields, you’re gonna dissolve your melee ennemis. Against wizards, you’re able to knockdown them and to bypass their damage reduction, even with epic ward. You’re also able to IGMS your ennemis if needed. 

Backstory :

Spellfang is an old and very smart dragon. He’s a guardian of the high forest, with the appearance of a simple human.
He’s wise and intelligent, able to cast complex spells, to understand the secrets of the shapeshange magic, but also able to maintain the environement, the animals, etc. He’s dangereous like an alien queen if you approach his eggs, his fangs are deadly, his blood is acid.
Alien wiki : "A Queen is a huge Xenomorph that serves as the mother and leader of a Xenomorph hive. Her appearance differs from that of a drone, with a pair of extra arms and a large head crest" and "Their acidic blood is capable of causing severe injury to humans".


The build :

Druid(5), Shifter(10), Illusionist(25), Human
 
STR: 8
DEX: 8
CON: 12
WIS: 18 (30)
INT: 16 (20)
CHA: 8

Damage shields : 1d4+5 + 1d6+25 + 1d8+50

Skills :
Animal Empathy 36(35), Concentration 43(44), Heal 43(53), Listen 36(48), Lore 43(48), Spellcraft 43(48), Spot 36(48), remaining skillpoints 27

EDIT : 

Spells necessary to learn (but every spell could be usefull) :
Every summoning spell, especially at the beginning +

Level 1 : magic missile (no save), true strike, grease, protection against alignment (for mind spells immunity), endure elements

Level 5 : Mestil's acid Sheat, energy buffer, lesser mind blank, lesser spell mantle
Level 6 : Greater stone skin, I'sGMS, Globe of invulnerability, true seeing, greater spell breach
Level 7 : Shadow Shield, Bigby's grasping hand, power word : stun, protection from spells, spell mantle
Level 8 : Premonition, Greater sanctuary
Level 9 : Time Stop, Greater spell mantle, Power word kill, Bigby's crushing hand
